### Notice of Tender: Request for Proposal for Retirement Training Courses

#### Tender Reference: 
The Government of Canada invites proposals for a Request for Proposal (RFP) to provide retirement training courses to Shared Services Canada (SSC).

#### Tender Details:
* **Solicitation Number:** R0000137210
* **Publication Date:** March 13, 2024
* **Tender Closing Date:** Friday, May 17, 2024, at 14:00:00
* **Procurement Category:** SRV (Management and Technology Services)

#### Description:
The Canadian Government's Shared Services Canada (SSC) is seeking a qualified service provider to deliver retirement training courses to its employees. The procurement is for the provision of the following services:

* Management education and training services
* Training planning, facilitation, and delivery services
* Training workshop service

#### Eligibility Criteria:
All participants are eligible to submit a proposal. There are no trade agreements that apply to this procurement.

#### Selection Criteria:
The tender will be selected based on a highest combined rating for technical merit and price.

#### Notice of Intent:
Public Works and Government Services Canada (PWGSC) will issue a Notice of Intent to award a contract to the successful bidder after the evaluation process is complete.

#### Contact Information:
Julie Dessureault
Director, Policy and Procurement Division
Government of Canada
400 Cooper St.
Ottawa, ON, K2P 2H8
Phone: 613- 608-3114
Email: Julie.Dessureault@ssc-spc.gc.ca

#### Additional Information:
Tender documents are available at [https://canadabuys.canada.ca](https://canadabuys.canada.ca). Suppliers are strongly advised to consult the tender documents and read the tender notice and terms of reference carefully.
